attributes.action: Strip Tony Blair of his appointment as a knight Commander
attributes.additional_details:
Firstly, I am a veteran who served in the army from 1986-2010. I know of many people who were affected by decisions he made which, secondly, he made, which were found to be false. As a result, many soldiers lost their lives in a war that should not have taken place. Since then, many soldiers ( not included in the statistics) have taken their own lives because of Iraq and Afghanistan.
I believe that there is a massive ‘want’ for this amongst the ‘British’ public
attributes.background: I would like parliament to debate whether (sir) Tony Blair should be stripped of his appointment.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that relate to honours and appointments, which includes calling for an honour to be removed.
